Retrieved 9 August 2010. | birth_place = Porto | death_date = | death_place = Viana do Castelo| nationality = Portuguese | occupation = Novelist, producer | net worth = | notableworks = The Last Pope | influences = | website = | religion = | signature = }} Luís Miguel Rocha (February 1976 – 26 March 2015) was a Portuguese author, television writer and producer."Author Lounge: Luis Miguel Rocha". Penguin Books. Retrieved 9 August 2010. Rocha wrote and produced television in London. Rocha's second novel, The Last Pope, was published in 2006. The novel examines the conspiracy theories about the death of Pope John Paul I. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1976 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Portuguese writers Category:Television writers Category:Television producers
title: Luís Miguel Rocha
